title: Approximate Region size in grafana didn't correspond to the actual value
body:
## Bug Report

<!-- Thanks for your bug report! Don't worry if you can't fill out all the sections. -->

### What version of TiKV are you using?
<!-- You can run `tikv-server --version` -->
v5.4.0
githash : b5262299604df88711d9ed4b84d43e9c507749a2
### What operating system and CPU are you using?
<!-- If you're using Linux, you can run `cat /proc/cpuinfo` -->

### Steps to reproduce
<!-- If possible, provide a recipe for reproducing the error. A complete runnable program is good. -->
Import some data, and then run workload some times. 
Then reset region size to 192M from 96M, after that run workload again. 

### What did you expect?
Approximate region size should not equal to 0.

### What did happened?
